org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.io

Class DhcpInterfaceResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.io.DhcpInterfaceResolver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DhcpServer, DhcpServer

    public class DhcpInterfaceResolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Works around the weakness with broadcast UDP in Java.
